books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: While the president of the United States is in New York to meet with his Russian counterpart, Detective Michael Bennett must stop a team of assassins prowling the Upper West Side.
books.name: BULLSEYE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: The journeys of the characters at the Rose Harbor Inn come to a close in this last book of the series.
books.name: SWEET TOMORROWS

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Tense turning points for three couples at a backyard barbecue gone wrong.
books.name: TRULY MADLY GUILTY

books.author: by Stuart Woods and Parnell Hall
books.description: When the former rogue C.I.A. agent Teddy Fay, a master of disguise, takes the lead to help a powerful woman, her fate, and that of the nation, is in his hands.
books.name: SMOOTH OPERATOR

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: A woman falls for a rich-bachelor vampire, but she also has a separate plan for which he is the bait. A Carpathian novel.
books.name: DARK CAROUSEL

books.author: by James Patterson with Michael Ledwidge
books.description: The New York detective Michael Bennett knows a staged suicide when he sees one.
books.name: CHASE

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, recruits and trains a doctor from Jerusalem to help capture a secret ISIS terrorist in France.
books.name: THE BLACK WIDOW

books.author: by Emma Cline
books.description: In the summer of 1969, a California teenager is drawn to a Manson-like cult.
books.name: THE GIRLS

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: After the death of Will Traynor, Louisa Clark joins a grief support group that may lead her to new love.
books.name: AFTER YOU

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: The first book of a new trilogy featuring Illarion, a dragon made into a human against his will. A Dark-Hunter novel.
books.name: DRAGONMARK
